Posts.Content: hello! my doctor has me on this pill (TAMOXIFEN) its making me sick ,so tired all the time,water gain,my nails not growing or hair, toe nails  turned black both of them, told the doctor, but im just worried, you know. i know after treaments your body needs time, but its been over a year now, and my body just doesnt like it, would like to do non toxic pill, whats out there?  help please! thank you for listening.
Posts.Title: pills and side effects
